blog.content:
Major ThreeFold News:

  • The new Grid Enhancement Proposal (GEP) has passed with 96% of our community voting in favour, meaning weâ€™ll be upgrading the ThreeFold Grid to V3 Alpha-5!

Community updates:

  • Weâ€™ll be attending Consensus 2022 Presented by CoinDesk in June as bronze sponsors to connect with attendees, share the ThreeFold story, and grow the community. Let us know if you or anyone you know will be in Austin and take advantage of our discount code!

  • Some of the ThreeFold team and ecosystem are gathering on the Nile this week to discuss how to build a better future through the Internet of Internets and creating abundance.

  • Weâ€™ve seen questions and confusion in the community around Internet capacity and connectivity. Find the answers here.

  • Registered to become a validator? Follow the verification process asap to secure your spot, as weâ€™ll share more information on activation soon!

  • Joined our community-led ThreeFold Discord channel!

Technology Developments:Â 

  • ThreeFold Grid V3.0.0 Alpha-6 is on devnet! Check out the full update on whatâ€™s happening in May here!

ThreeFold Grid:

  • The Grid Enhancement Proposal on cloud unit pricing has passed with 97% of participants agreeing to the current pricing. Thank you all for voting!

  • Again, we urge you to migrate 3Nodes to V3 asap. It just takes a few steps, the migration process is quite simple and fast.

  • The global shipping of Titan orders continues, though Europe is experiencing some provisioning delays. In case of any specific questions, please reach out to the support team.

Until next time, ThreeFolders!Â  ðŸ™ŒÂ 


Weâ€™re looking for community stories and would love you to share your story and/or be featured in ThreeFold content. Thank you for reaching out!


You can find the previous editions on our blog. For older editions of ThreeFold Weekly (Vol 1-11), go to our forum.
blog.excerpt: Welcome to the 17th edition of ThreeFold Weekly. Letâ€™s dive into last weekâ€™s highlights throughout the ThreeFold ecosystem.
